alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:35PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 715 PM MST... At 635 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Christmas, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Hayden, Christmas, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool and San Carlos Reservoir. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 250 and 251. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 254. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 135 and 141, near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 146 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos
